osyfe

Class Settings

  • java.lang.Object
    • osyfe.Settings

  • public class Settings
extends java.lang.Object
    The game settings, which have to be set before the Screen.open call.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean AL
      Enables OpenAL and the audio package (default: false).
      static boolean ANISOTROPIC
      Enables anisotropic filtering, if supported (default: true).
      static boolean DEBUG
      Enables the LWJGL debug option (default: false).
      static int FPS_CAP
      Sets the maximum fps (default: 61).
      static boolean FULLSCREEN
      Enables the fullscreen mode (default: false).
      static int HEIGHT
      The window dimensions (if not fullscreen, default: 800x600).
      static int MSAA_SAMPLES
      Sets the oversampling factor (default: 1).
      static boolean REMOTERY
      Enables the Remotery monitoring tool (default: false).
      static java.lang.String TITLE
      The window title.
      static boolean V_SYNC
      Enables vertical synchronization (default: false).
      static int WIDTH
      The window dimensions (if not fullscreen, default: 800x600).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Settings() 

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • AL

        public static boolean AL
        Enables OpenAL and the audio package (default: false).

      • ANISOTROPIC

        public static boolean ANISOTROPIC
        Enables anisotropic filtering, if supported (default: true).

      • DEBUG

        public static boolean DEBUG
        Enables the LWJGL debug option (default: false).

      • FPS_CAP

        public static int FPS_CAP
        Sets the maximum fps (default: 61).

      • FULLSCREEN

        public static boolean FULLSCREEN
        Enables the fullscreen mode (default: false).

      • HEIGHT

        public static int HEIGHT
        The window dimensions (if not fullscreen, default: 800x600).

      • MSAA_SAMPLES

        public static int MSAA_SAMPLES
        Sets the oversampling factor (default: 1). A value of 0 disables it, but is incompatible with the Nuklear GUI (use 1 instead).

      • REMOTERY

        public static boolean REMOTERY
        Enables the Remotery monitoring tool (default: false).

      • TITLE

        public static java.lang.String TITLE
        The window title.

      • V_SYNC

        public static boolean V_SYNC
        Enables vertical synchronization (default: false).

      • WIDTH

        public static int WIDTH
        The window dimensions (if not fullscreen, default: 800x600).
